question: In HTML, text inside the <pre> tag:
options: Preserves all spaces and line breaks exactly as typed
answer: Preserves all spaces and line breaks exactly as typed

question: Every HTML element contains which of the following?
options: The value assigned to the attribute

question: Which of the following statements is correct about HTML attributes?
options: Attributes are written inside the closing tag
Attributes are always written in upper case only
Attributes provide additional information about an element
Attributes are mandatory to html elements.
answer: Attributes provide additional information about an element
